mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.news_id AS "newsId", a.news_reader AS "newsReader.id", a.read_date AS "readDate", a.read_num AS "readNum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks",
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_history( id, news_id, news_reader, read_date, read_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{newsId}, #{newsReader.id}, #{readDate}, #{readNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE news_history SET news_id = #{newsId}, news_reader = #{newsReader.id}, read_date = #{readDate}, read_num = #{readNum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
